de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solution

Class SimpleSolvedPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solution.AbstractPeriodWrapper
      • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solution.SimpleSolvedPeriod

  • public class SimpleSolvedPeriod
extends AbstractPeriodWrapper
    This class is a simple period solution wrapper which only stores the values for the two decision variables (setup and amount)
    Author:
    Andi Popp
